attributes.action: Sack the MP for SellyOak Lynne Jones immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Her comments regarding troops in Selly Oak hospital are unforgiveable.  A better idea  would be to give her a rifle (no ammunition, the country can't afford it) and send her to Afghanistan.  In fact, we could create a battalion of Labour MPs and send the lot.
